hadiths.text: Abu Sa'eed Al-Khudri narrated that :Allah's Messenger said: "Whoever sleeps past Al-Witr or forgets it, then let him pray it when he remembers it or when he awakens

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الرَّجُلِ يَنَامُ عَنِ الْوِتْرِ أَوْ يَنْسَاهُ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About A Man Who Sleeps Past Al-Witr Or Forgets It
